faqs.question: How much does it cost to paint a room?
faqs.answer: Costs depend on room size, preparation needed, and paint quality. We provide free, detailed quotes for every job.

faqs.question: What paints do you use?
faqs.answer: We use premium paints from Dulux, Farrow & Ball, and Little Greene. We're happy to use your preferred brand too.

faqs.question: How long will it take?
faqs.answer: A typical room takes 1-2 days. Full house projects usually take 1-2 weeks depending on size.

faqs.question: Do you move furniture?
faqs.answer: Yes! We carefully move and cover all furniture, and leave everything exactly as we found it.
